summary: A young college student and his friends use an Ouija board to hold a seance, triggering a chain of mysterious deaths that may be caused by an otherworldly force.
cast: Joe Absolom|Lara Belmont|Melanie Gutteridge|Lukas Haas|James Hillier|Alec Newman|Mel Raido|Marsha Thomason|Tom Bell|Michael Feast|Cyril Nri|Tameka Empson|Peter Gevisser|Derek Lea|Joel Pitts|Pete Valente|Virginia Fanshawe|Anita Kelsey|Olivia Caffrey|Rodney Hart|Mark Barratt|Natalie Maloy|Nicolas Chagrin|Tony Lee
title: Long Time Dead (Muertos del pasado)
